Generate a Neighboring Solution by Swapping Treatments in a Data Frame

Source: R/speed_df.R
generate_neighbor_df.Rd

Creates a new design by swapping treatments within specified swap groups.

Usage

generate_neighbor_df(
  design_df,
  treatment_col,
  swap_group_col,
  swap_count = 1,
  swap_all_blocks = FALSE
)

Arguments

design_df

A data frame containing the current design

treatment_col

The column name containing treatments

swap_group_col

The column name containing swap groups

swap_count

Number of swaps to perform

swap_all_blocks

Whether to perform swaps in all blocks

Value

A data frame with the new design after swaps

On this page
